attributes.action: stop the construction of a supermarket(proposed Tesco) anywhere near our river in Hadleigh, Suffolk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A supermarket near our river would have a very negative impact on the environment.  It would be a visual pollution, damaging the beauty of our historic Town, for which Hadleigh is renowned.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " stop the construction of a supermarket(proposed Tesco) anywhere near our river in Hadleigh, Suffolk."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15270.asp

Prime Minister's Office
